scripts.deploy:echo: gcloud beta functions deploy echo --project gh-trending-chatbot --stage-bucket gh-trending-chatbot-bucket --trigger-http
scripts.deploy:verify: gcloud beta functions deploy verify --project gh-trending-chatbot --stage-bucket gh-trending-chatbot-bucket --trigger-http
scripts.deploy:getAvatar: gcloud beta functions deploy getAvatar --project gh-trending-chatbot --stage-bucket gh-trending-chatbot-bucket --trigger-http
